dt: {bc}to publish the name of as condemned to death with the property of the condemned forfeited to the state
{bc}to condemn or forbid as harmful or unlawful {bc}{sx|prohibit||}

et: Latin {it}proscribere{/it} to publish, proscribe, from {it}pro-{/it} before + {it}scribere{/it} to write {ma}{mat|scribe|}{/ma}
shortdef: to publish the name of as condemned to death with the property of the condemned forfeited to the state
to condemn or forbid as harmful or unlawful : prohibit
